credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Purse
provenance: Ex. Coll. of Georges Saville Seligman
medium:
Medium: silk and  metal thread embroidery with gilt spangles on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, knot and couching stitches with attached coils of gilt foil and gilt spangles on plain weave foundation
description: Small shield-shaped purse embroidered in colored silks and metal threads. On one side, a shepherdess and sheep, and on the other a shepherd with a dog, each embroidered in colored silks against a couched silver ground. Figures largely in knot stitch.  Border of gold embroidery with spangles. Clasp of silver or steel, with spring.
name: Purse
